api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://isparsh-recharge-lapu-base-v1.p.rapidapi.com/isparshapi/api?username=your_username&pwd=your_password &circlecode=your_circlecode&operatorcode=operator_code&number=mobileordth_no &amount=amount"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "isparsh-recharge-lapu-base-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
